content: cascade beret is a cable and lace beret knit on two circular needles and inspired by the shapes and movement of water as it tumbles over rocks available in sizes s m and l 1 2 2 balls thanks to bonniesd for pointing out an error in the pattern row 11 decreasing round should read p1 sl next st to right needle k1 psso return worked st back to left needle pass next st over move back to **right** needle
